name: Lavyrinthos Minotaurus
description:
Controls:
WASD: movement
Mouse: Look
R: Restart
Esc: Back to Menu

Story:
You are an ancient Greek on his usual night stroll, but unfortunately you got lost in the Minotaur's labyrinth. You need to find the magic key, to open the magically sealed door, and get back to your usual Greek life without letting the Minotaur catch you.

Credits:
Nikolas Jon Hjorth-Bak Mastrandreas: Programmer
Lukas Matias Egde Glahn: 3D designer (world)
Frederick Dufour: 3D modeller (The Minotaur)
Stellan Emil Legendre Dahl: Textures & Graphics
Mathias Egeriis Bond: Sound Design
Kevin Peter Madsen: 3D modeller (assets)

Thanks for playing our demo!
